info.name: #0. API Documentation
info.description:
**API documentation** is technical content that describes the API in detail.

It includes instructions on how to effectively use and integrate the API, with an emphasis on any security constraints.

It also provides updates with regard to the API's lifecycle such as new versions or impending retirement.

Allows you to describe the structure of your APIs so that machines can read them.

Based on api doucmentaion , only we need to understand the API implemations. Usually this will be shared by Dev team or client side. We need get clear understanding form this one before starting our testing acitivity.
